review:
I have got my orthodontic treatment from Dr. Kamala bai. *** ** **** ************* *** friendly. She explained all the treatment plans before she started off. I’m seeing a change in the alignment of my teeth and I’m very excited for the end result. 
The doctor made sure that I was comfortable throughout my treatment.
The clinic is following all the sterilisation protocol.
Highly recommend Dr. Kamala bai .
Happy smiling!!!
I got my teeth scaling and cavity filling done by Dr. Kamala. She handled the job very professionally. Well -maintained, hygienic ambience and equipment, well trained staff.

"Highly recommended"....! I'm done with my root canal treatment,fillings and 2 caps. Treatment was painless and done with utmost care .Dr Kamala was very friendly and also suggests best treatment option for any kind of dental issues.Thank you
